abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Analyze the input to identify, isolate, and characterize its essential components, attributes, and relationships that define its structure and function.

Evaluate the effect of specified changes or transformations on elements or outcomes by determining resulting states and measuring differences (assess modification impact), and combine, adjust, and transform multiple quantitative inputs to produce a unified output measure that satisfies defined conditions (quantitative data integration).
Derive a new quantitative value by applying a specified functional relationship or transformation to one or more input measures or previously computed values.
